short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to convert calendars to each other inside a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you to convert dates from one calendar to another one, that you see on a webpage. When you are surfing the web, you see some dates in articles and news, but you want to convert them to your desired calendar. This extension lets you do this conversion in a simple way.

Supported Calendars

- Gregorian
- Persian

Supported Languages

- English
- فارسی
